long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thanks to the "Gmantrix" extension, you can read phrase codes directly on the pages of any site! Just select the text and the pop-up will display the codes in different ciphers. In the settings, you can change the way the popup is displayed: immediately after text is selected or after clicking on the button. You can choose to display the phrase in the popup or not.
